section.title: Installing from RPM
section.para: When using a RedHat-based distribution the easiest way to install OpenDaylight is to use the prebuilt RPM packages. This can be done by downloading the packages or installing from the YUM repository.

section.title: Installing from YUM Repository
section.para:
Use this method to install OpenDaylight using the yum repo:
Install the yum repo: Download the yum repository file
Install OpenDaylight Edition of your choice
OpenDaylight Base Edition
$sudo yum install opendaylight
OpenDaylight Virtualization Edition
$sudo yum install opendaylight-virtualization
OpenDaylight Service Provider Edition
$sudo yum install opendaylight-serviceprovider
